page.title: 16RELIGION (Survey-part four)
page.content: In our survey area there is Bardsea Parish Church, and a Christian Fellowship group meets in Croftlands Junior School. The other churches are in Ulverston or surrounding towns and villages. The results of our survey show the following: Church of England 62% Methodist 12% Roman Catholic 4% United Reformed 3% Buddhism 3% Christian Fellowship 2% Assembly of God 2% Judaism 2% 10% of the questionaires were left blank in this section. The relatively high percentage of Buddhists is due to the presence of the Buddhist Institute in Conishead Priory.
